alert.note: Alert for Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Northwest Highlands; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 3:41AM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches except between 6 and 12 inches above 7500 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Northwest Highlands, and Upper Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from Noon today to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-25. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Northwest Highlands; Upper Rio Grande Valley
